question:
[Timothy] wanted to join the theater group his sister [Christine] was a part of. [Christine]'s mother, [Patricia], signed him up for the group. [Timothy] took his sister [Connie] out to lunch after learning that she got accepted into her first choice for university. [Cornelius] was having trouble with his divorce because he only got to see his daughter [Patricia] a few times a week
Question: How is [Cornelius] related to [Connie]?

- [Patricia] is the mother of [Timothy] and [Christine]

Step 4: Analyze the potential relationships
- Based on the information provided, it is not explicitly stated whether [Cornelius] is the father of [Connie] or not
- However, we can infer that [Cornelius] is not the father of [Connie] because [Patricia] is mentioned as the mother of [Timothy] and [Christine], and [Connie] is their sister
- Therefore, [Cornelius] is not related to [Connie] as a father
